name: Proffiz
tagline: help Startups and SMEs to build Great Products
description:
Proffiz is software & product engineering company with the delivery center in Eastern Europe (Lviv, Ukraine).
We help startups and software vendors to develop great products for Fortune 500 companies, as well as setup and operate seamlessly integrated nearshore/offshore teams.
Proffiz is founded by the professional team with 14 years of diverse experience in IT industry covering North America and EU markets. We are proficient in both innovative startups and enterprise-level projects.
Our primary technology stack is Blockchain, Ethereum, Angular, React, Java, Node.js, .NET, NoSQL, Android & iOS.
Â 
We offer:
Solutions for Startups (from idea validation to market-ready product development)
Custom Software Development
Managed Dedicated Teams
Tech Consulting (architecture, security, SDLC)
